PAN AMERICAN is planning ahead for YOU!
Giant, postwar Flying Clippers are designed to carry
100 and 200 passengers at 300 miles per hour.
TRAVEL COMFORT BLENDS EASILY
WITH BUSINESS OPPORTUNITY
LoW-COST, high-speed luxury is the keynote
of Pan American World Airways service,
now and in the future.
The time-saving,
modern way to go to Latin
America, experienced travelers will tell you, is via
the System of the Flying Clippers.
Here is a travel thrill! Relaxed in the armchair
comfort of a world-famous Pan American Clipper,
you experience the last word in speedy, modern
air transportation. Below you the dazzling con-
Latin America is but one of the world's great areas to which
Pan American pioneered international air service, before the war.*
trasts of a continent unfold: Cosmopolitan cities...
Vast jungles...Superb scenic panoramas... Mighty
rivers ...Lofty mountain peaks... Exotic villages
and remnants of ancient civilizations...A veritable
riot of color... And a gay, friendly people. Travel
comfort blends easily with business opportunity.
